I am not satisfied with doctor treatment. He will not give more time to patients because I visited for my son's urine problem and he just saw the report and he will not give more time to listen to our problem.

I went to hospital as I had kidney related problem. Treatment was good. Medicines was prescribed. Doctor was really good. I am satisfied with the treatment given. Waiting time was there in hospital. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends.
